name: Stuffed Strawberries
author: IMVINTAGE
summary: Yum, yum! Sometimes I add some finely chopped semi-sweet chocolate. These are perfect for baby showers or wedding showers. A plastic sandwich bag can be used instead of a pastry bag by filling with the cream cheese mix and making a tiny cut in the corner.
ingredients: ½ cup confectioners' sugar, or to taste
2 tablespoons orange flavored liqueur, or to taste
directions: Cut the tops off of the strawberries and stand upright on the cut side
Make a cut 3/4 of the way down from the tip of the strawberry towards the bottom
Beat together the cream cheese, sugar, and liqueur until smooth in a mixer or a food processor
Place into a piping bag with a star tip
Pipe into each strawberry and arrange on a serving platter
